花独活: (ハナウド) - Heracleum nipponicum (species of hogweed)
花町: (はなまち) - red-light district; prostitution quarter; geisha quarter
花畑: (hanabatake) - campo de flores, jardim de flores, canteiro de flores
花疲れ: (はなづかれ) - tiredness after cherry blossom watching
花盗人: (はなぬすびと) - person who steals flowers
花盛り: (はなざかり) - flowers in full bloom/time of year in which flowers are in full bloom; the age at which someone (esp. a woman) is at the peak of their beauty; booming or peaking (in popularity)
花相撲: (はなずもう) - {sumo} tournament other than the six major tournaments
花神: (かしん) - god of flowers; flower spirit
花笠: (はながさ) - type of conical hat adorned with flowers (used in Japanese traditional performing arts)
花笠音頭: (はながさおんど) - traditional ballad sung wearing hanagasa (esp. Yamagata Pref.)
花筏: (ハナイカダ) - floral raft/flower raft/flower petals fallen on water, resembling a raft; Helwingia japonica (species of shrub); oily perfume applied under white makeup
花筵: (はなむしろ) - mat with a floral or bulrush pattern
花簪: (ハナカンザシ) - (はなかんざし only) artificial hairpin with ornamental flowers; chamomile sunray (Rhodanthe anthemoides)
花籠: (はなこ) - (はなかご, はなこ only)  flower basket; (はなかご, けこ only) (usu. けこ) flower basket (or plate) used for flower-scattering rituals
花粉化石: (かふんかせき) - palynomorph; pollen fossil
花粉情報: (かふんじょうほう) - pollen report
花粉母細胞: (かふんぼさいぼう) - pollen mother cell
花粉症: (かふんしょう) - hay fever; pollinosis (allergy to pollen)
花粉管核: (かふんかんかく) - pollen tube nucleus
花紅柳緑: (かこうりゅうりょく) - (yoji) red blossoms and green willows; beautiful scenery of spring; natural beauty; beauty of nature
花綵列島: (かさいれっとう) - island arc (like the Aleutian Islands)
花自動車: (はなじどうしゃ) - a flower-bedecked vehicle
花色: (はないろ) - color of a flower (colour); light indigo/light blue
花花しい: (はなばなしい) - brilliant; magnificent; spectacular
花芽形成: (かがけいせい) - flower bud formation
花茗荷: (ハナミョウガ) - peppermint stick (species of perennial evergreen, Alpinia japonica)
花茣蓙: (はなござ) - rush mat with a floral or bulrush pattern
花菖蒲: (はなあやめ) - Japanese iris; blue flag; Iris ensata
花菜漬: (はななづけ) - pickling of unopened rape blossoms
花菜漬け: (はななづけ) - pickling of unopened rape blossoms
花落ち: (はなおち) - the part of the fruit from which the flower has dropped
花蕊: (かずい) - center of a flower (centre); pistils and stamens
花虎の尾: (ハナトラノオ) - false dragonhead (Physostegia virginiana); obedient plant
花虫綱: (かちゅうこう) - Anthozoa; class of cnidarians
花虻: (ハナアブ) - hoverfly (any fly of family Syrphidae)/syrphid; drone fly (Eristalis tenax)
花蜘蛛: (ハナグモ) - Misumenops tricuspidatus (species of crab spider)
花街: (はなまち) - red-light district; prostitution quarter; geisha quarter
花衣: (はなごろも) - fancy kimono used for cherry blossom viewing; fancy kimono
花見: (hanami) - observação de flores de cerejeira, observação de flores
花見の宴: (はなみのうたげ) - cherry blossom viewing party
花見酒: (はなみざけ) - sake drunk while viewing cherry blossoms
花角力: (はなずもう) - {sumo} wrestling outside the formal tournaments; wrestling just for fun
花言葉: (はなことば) - language of flowers; floriography; flower symbolism, e.g. red roses mean love
花詞: (はなことば) - language of flowers; floriography; flower symbolism, e.g. red roses mean love
花豆: (ハナマメ) - scarlet runner bean (Phaseolus coccineus)
花貝: (ハナガイ) - Placamen tiara (species of venerid)
花車椿: (はなぐるまつばき) - hanakuruma camelia; Camellia japonica var.
花酒: (はなさけ) - strong awamori (60%) from Yonaguni Island, Okinawa
花金: (はなきん) - (from 花の金曜日) thank God it's Friday; TGIF; going out on Friday night; flowery Friday (when young men et al. stay out late)
花鋏: (はなばさみ) - florist's scissors; flower scissors
花開く: (はなひらく) - to blossom; to flower; to bloom
花髭鱓: (ハナヒゲウツボ) - ribbon eel (Rhinomuraena quaesita)
